tool_description: Finds books similar to given reference books based on various similarity metrics and criteria.

reference_book_ids.description: Array of reference book IDs to find similar books for

similarity_metrics.description: Metrics to use for similarity: genre, author, themes, writing_style, publication_era, length

max_results.description: Maximum number of similar books to return (1-100)

exclude_same_author.description: Whether to exclude books by the same authors

error_messages: Empty reference_book_ids: Provide at least one reference book ID.
Too many reference books: Maximum 10 reference book IDs allowed.
Invalid similarity metrics: Use valid metrics from [genre, author, themes, writing_style, publication_era, length].
Invalid similarity_threshold: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid max_results: Must be between 1 and 100.
Reference book not found: One or more reference book IDs could not be found.
No similar books found: No books meet the similarity threshold criteria.
usage: Provide reference_book_ids array with books to find similarities for. Configure similarity_metrics to control what aspects are compared and adjust similarity_threshold to control result quality vs quantity.

similar_book_ids.description: Array of book IDs for similar books found

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each found book (0.0-1.0)

similarity_reasons.description: Explanation of why each book is considered similar

books_found.description: Total number of similar books found

metrics_used.description: Similarity metrics that were successfully applied
